content: repeat row 8 - 9 row 12 repeat row 8 5 wonderment socks by debbie ford written instruction large row 1 p4 1/2 lc p1 1/2 rc p1 × 3 1/2 lc p1 1/2 rc p3 38 sts row 2 k7 p1 k7 × 3 p1 k6 row3 p4 k3 p1 k7 × 3 p1 k3 p3 row 4 - 5 repeat row 2 - 3 row 6 repeat row 2 row 7 p4 1/2 rc p1 1/2 lc p1 × 3 1/2 rc p1 1/2 lc p3 row 8 k11 p1 k7 p1 x 2 k10 row 9 p4 k7 p1 × 2 k7 p3 row 10 - 11 repeat row 8 - 9 row 12 repeat row 8 i love seeing what you make tag your photos with @daisystitches on instagram and use the hashtags #wondermentsocks and #debbieforddesigns this pattern has been tested and tech edited for pattern support you can email me at de88ieford@yahoo co uk happy knitting 6 wonderment socks by debbie ford
